listing.title: 2 Bed (Type 4) – Duplex with Marina View - Gateway Al Zorah
listing.description: This luxurious 2 Bed (Type 4) – Duplex unit offers an expansive Marina View from the heart of Gateway Porto Al Zorah. With a total area of 2301 ft², this off-plan property provides a premium lifestyle in an exclusive marina-facing community. Expected handover by December 2026. Payment plan: 50/50. Unfurnished. Ideal for modern waterfront living.
